chat_history.message:
Hello, 
My product iPhone 12 has the above problem: 
Hello everyone,
I ordered an iPhone 12 in very good condition, which states that it may have scratches on the housing that are not visible from 50cm away.
The top front edge has two small scratches, which can also be seen from a distance.
As it's a gift for my daughter's birthday, I don't know if a return is still possible in time.
Therefore, I ask if a price reduction is possible, since the condition does not match the stated 'very good' one.
I'm looking forward to your response.

Thank you for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

We will reimburse the customer 60.00 euros because he received the device in poor condition.

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Fabio Back Market customer Care
